com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.widget

Class PJSplitPaneProportional.InnerComponentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.swing.widget.PJSplitPaneProportional.InnerComponentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    PJSplitPaneProportional

    protected class PJSplitPaneProportional.InnerComponentListener
extends Object
implements ComponentListener
    This inner class is used to handle resize events. The proportional divider location is correctly maintained as this component is resized.

    If this class is subclassed, an override for method PJSplitPaneProportional.createInnerComponentListener() must be created.

    Author:
    Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    PJSplitPaneProportional.createInnerComponentListener(), PJSplitPaneProportional.InnerMouseListener
